index.noKey: A SHODAN key is needed to run this module (https://account.shodan.io/register)

pathToName.badPath: Bad file path or not supported file type

types.domain: Any valid domain, ie: google.com, www.google.com
types.host: Any valid host (domain or IPv4/IPv6 single address)

nmap.targets: Single hostname ipv4 (still not ipv6), a CIDR or a numerical range, ie: 192.168.0.0/24, 192.168.1.1-5

types.ipsRange: ie: 192.168.0.1-5 (only last block supported for now)
